name: Mobility as a Service Alliance
goal: The Mobility as a Service (MaaS) Alliance is a public-private partnership creating the foundations for a common approach to MaaS, unlocking the economies of scale needed for successful implementation and take-up of MaaS in Europe and beyond. The main goal is to facilitate a single, open market and full deployment of MaaS services.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: European transport policy, Digital Single Market development, transport decarbonisation, platform economy, sharing economy
